text: Lake Valhalla is a glacial lake located in the Okanogan-Wenatchee National Forest of the state of Washington. Positioned adjacent to the Pacific Crest Trail, the lake and its surrounding areas are popular for hiking, climbing and other recreational activities. == See also == * Lichtenberg Mountain * Mount McCausland ==References== ==External links== *GNIS Feature Detail Report for Lake Valhalla Valhalla
title: Lake Valhalla
